amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Education to conduct a study on the amount of cost to States to comply with the requirements of the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act and requires a report to be submitted to Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 108-79 to require the Secretary of Education to conduct a study within 2 years after the enactment of the act on the cost to each state for compliance with this act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Garrett (NJ).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
